snippet: While the Republican Party in New Jersey is somewhat stronger than in other Northeastern states, the dynamics shaping the state's politics are more likely to keep moving it to the left than back to the right.
abstract: While the Republican Party in New Jersey is somewhat stronger than in other Northeastern states, the dynamics shaping the state's politics are more likely to keep moving it to the left than back to the right.

headline.main: In Blue New Jersey, Red Spots May Be Sign of the Past
